login.title: Login Help
login.content: Enter your username and password to log in. If you forgot your password, contact the administrator.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard Help
adminDashboard.content: This is the main dashboard for administrators. You can manage products, stock levels, and user permissions.

userDashboard.title: User Dashboard Help
userDashboard.content: This is the main dashboard for users. You can search for products and view stock levels.

addProduct.title: Adding Products
addProduct.content: To add a product, enter its name, quantity, and price. Click 'Add Product' to confirm.

deleteProduct.title: Deleting Products
deleteProduct.content: To delete a product, search for it, select it, and confirm deletion.

changeProduct.title: Editing Products
changeProduct.content: Modify the product quantity or price and save the changes.
